title: Venture Capital and Startup Summarization Results
description: Output records containing collected articles, funding news, and AI-generated summaries from Venture Capital and Startup RSS feeds. Records are pushed even if content extraction fails.

source.description: The name of the news source (e.g., 'TechCrunch (Venture)', 'VentureBeat').

title.description: The title of the startup or funding news article.

url.description: The URL of the original article.

published.description: The publication date/time string from the RSS feed.

content.description: The full, extracted content of the article. This will contain a placeholder message if extraction failed or the URL was filtered.

summary.description: The final summary. This is either the AI-generated summary of the funding/startup news, the original RSS feed summary, or a fallback message.
